CustomField.description: Formula to check if the value should be Active, Inactive or Pending Activation based on the start and end dates
CustomField.formula: IF((POE_Start_Date__c <= TODAY()) && (ISBLANK(POE_End_Date__c) || (POE_End_Date__c > TODAY())), 'Active', IF((POE_End_Date__c < TODAY() || Inactive_Store__c = True), 'Inactive', IF(ISBLANK(POE_Start_Date__c) && ISBLANK(POE_End_Date__c), 'Pending Activation', IF(POE_Start_Date__c > TODAY(), 'Pending Activation', 'Inactive' )) ) )
CustomField.label: Status
